name: YamaYama
description:
YamaYama is a whacky party game where you complete all sorts of mini-games to collect points on your path to victory. Most of the game modes utilise the FatSuit mechanic, where characters blow out and push other players away. It is made with easy-to-learn controls, so you can play with both video game veterans and newbies.


• 2-4 player local and online multiplayer
• Single player with 1-3 Monkey AI bots
• An excellent new game for the party!
• 23 game modes
• 6 characters
• The ultimate new game for the party!
